subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee has asked John Furlong, the head of the Vancouver Olympics, for more details on his claims of a deal with Russia during the bidding for the 2010 Winter Games.
snippet: The International Olympic Committee has asked John Furlong, the head of the Vancouver Olympics, for more details on his claims of a deal with Russia during the bidding for the 2010 Winter Games.
